sentences.en: A stalk connecting an ovule or a seed with the placenta.
sentences.cn: 珠柄与胚珠或含胎座的种子相接的叶柄.

sentences.en: Allergic people shall not take royal jelly, they shall take queen bee placenta.
sentences.cn: 有过敏体质的人群不宜服用蜂王浆.改服“蜂王胎宝”.

sentences.en: Description Pomona moisturizing cr è me is enriched with Placenta and Collagen extract to refine facial treatment.
sentences.cn: 产品概述:该产品含有羊胎素和胶原蛋白精华,能够积极改善皮肤护理.

sentences.en: Factors that can affect the placenta include maternal high blood pressure, stress and smoking.
sentences.cn: 影响胚盘的因素包括母体的高血压 、 压力和吸烟.

sentences.en: Folk applications include rheumatoid arthritis, impotence, irregular menses, placenta not being expelled after birth.
sentences.cn: 民间雪莲用于治疗风湿性关节炎 、 阳痿 、 妇女月经不调 、 胎衣不下.

sentences.en: Funicle ( funiculus ) The stalk attaching the ovule ( later the seed ) to the placenta angiosperm ovaries.
sentences.cn: 中连接胚珠 ( 之后的种子 ) 和胎座的柄.

sentences.en: Funicle ( funiculus ) The stalk attaching the ovule ( later the seed ) to the placenta in angiosperm ovaries.
sentences.cn: 被子植物 子房中连接胚珠 ( 之后的种子 ) 和胎座的柄.

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate the cell source secreting the granulocyte granulocyte colony - stimulating factors ( GM - CSF , G - CSF ) in human placenta.
sentences.cn: 目的: 确定脐血中高水平的造血因子的来源.

sentences.en: Starch grains present in the embryo sac and placenta are utilized by the embryo.
sentences.cn: 存在于胚囊和胎座中的淀粉粒为胚胎所利用.

sentences.en: The drug can be transferred to the baby via the placenta.
sentences.cn: 该药会通过胎盘传给胎儿。

sentences.en: What is dried human placenta, in the abdomen fetal?
sentences.cn: 紫河车是什么, 腹中胎儿?

trans.tran_en: an organ that forms inside a woman’s  uterus  to feed an unborn baby
